ModMetaData.name: Pawn Editor Forked
ModMetaData.author: Segas Wolf (Fork of ISOREX, legodude17, Taranchuk, TreadTheDawnGames, mycroftjr, Inglix, fofajardo)
ModMetaData.description:
Pawn Editor - Community Fork maintained by Segas Wolf.
Stability and compatibility fixes for RimWorld 1.6. Original mod created by ISOR3X / legodude17.
v2.1.0 update: - Applied stability patch set (#001, #002, #004, #007, #008, #009, #010, #012, #018, #019). - Top-right button requires Dev Mode. - Selected pawn Edit gizmo requires Dev Mode + God Mode. - Social tab defaults to showing all relations on first open.
